member.name: JOBOBJECT_EXTENDED_LIMIT_INFORMATION
member.summary: Contains basic and extended limit information for a job object.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_EXTENDED_LIMIT_INFORMATION.BasicLimitInformation
member.summary: A structure that contains basic limit information.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_EXTENDED_LIMIT_INFORMATION.ProcessMemoryLimit
member.summary: If the LimitFlags member of the structure specifies the JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_PROCESS_MEMORY value, this member specifies the limit for the virtual memory that can be committed by a process. Otherwise, this member is ignored.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_EXTENDED_LIMIT_INFORMATION.JobMemoryLimit
member.summary: If the LimitFlags member of the structure specifies the JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_JOB_MEMORY value, this member specifies the limit for the virtual memory that can be committed for the job. Otherwise, this member is ignored.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_EXTENDED_LIMIT_INFORMATION.PeakProcessMemoryUsed
member.summary: The peak memory used by any process ever associated with the job.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_EXTENDED_LIMIT_INFORMATION.PeakJobMemoryUsed
member.summary: The peak memory usage of all processes currently associated with the job.
